definition: classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
a piece of land of 1.3 mu 畝|亩[mu3]/(fig.) one's turf

sentences.english: They set aside 50 mu for an experimental farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们拨出50亩地作实验农场。

sentences.english: Let your work be, bride, the guest has come in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 放下亩裟工作吧，新娘，客人在晚上来了。

sentences.english: Hence, it nourishes the best 420 mu tea garden in Nanyue.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这里也润泽着南岳最好的420亩茶园。

sentences.english: The third part, elaborate farm tax and excise tax reform"s meaning for Sichuan."
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，阐述摊丁入亩对四川的意义。

sentences.english: Planted 300 acres of apple orchard and 500 acres of fine chestnut base.
sentences.chinese: 种植了300亩精品苹果园和500亩板栗基地。

sentences.english: Planted 300 acres of apple orchard and 500 acres of fine chestnut base.
sentences.chinese: 种植了300亩精品苹果园和500亩板栗基地。

sentences.english: How much land does a man need?
sentences.chinese: 一个人究竟需要多少亩地？

sentences.english: Your shirt does not match with your pants no offence.
sentences.chinese: 没有冒犯亩裟意思，但亩裟衬衣和裤子不配。

sentences.english: Furthermore my family only has 6 mu of irrigated land and the harvest was fairly ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 而且家里仅有6亩水浇地的收成也一般。

sentences.english: The company total amount of investment is 100 million RMB and covers 316 acres.
sentences.chinese: 公司投资总额1亿元人民币，占地面积316亩。

sentences.english: We mus plant more trees and stop the people cutting them .
sentences.chinese: 我们亩种植更多的树木和停止削减他们的人。

sentences.english: The company occupies 736 acres of plant mentioned in the United States red wine grapes.
sentences.chinese: 公司占地736亩种植美国红提及酿酒葡萄。

sentences.english: Located in Songjiang Industrial Park, Shanghai, with the land areas of 81 Mus.
sentences.chinese: 位于上海市松江工业区，占地面积81亩。

sentences.english: This luxury development occupies 45 acres and comprises 80 custom villas.
sentences.chinese: 这个奢华的新开发项目占底亩，由80家别墅组成。

sentences.english: This quarter of an acre, so poorly planted.
sentences.chinese: 在那四分之一亩的地方，树木既种得那样少。

definition: floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
